recipesJson.name: BlueHue
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A recipe that tastes and feels like the color blue
Recipe created for WEEKEND ASSIGNMENT: BLUE ->

reviews.text: Smell out of the bottle and a the first couple of hits off a fresh dripping remind me of blue sour candy (minus the sour).  Flavour dries and thins a little over subsequent puffs though.  Could do with some percentage tweaks for my personal tastes but overall a nice vape.
The flavour of this recipe is great, like a 'dark' berryish cotton candy, though I find it quite harsh and dry overall.
